txt.en: Captain Garmund can be found at the western watch-tower, just west of Cliving.\n\nGarmund will be most appreciative of your efforts to remove the White Hand Orcs from the occupied farmhouses.
Talk to Captain Garmund outside of Cliving

White Hand Orcs have taken to occupying and desecrating the once-peaceful farmsteads of the noble crofters of Cliving.\n\nThe strongest among the Orc-infantry have taken to claiming each structure as their own personal habitat.
'These pillagers are a grim indication of what the Orcs intend to accomplish. They have defiled the deserted homes of the crofters; it is a fine deed you have done in removing their presence.'
White Hand Orcs have taken to occupying and desecrating the once-peaceful farmsteads of the noble crofters of Cliving.
Defeat the White Hand pillagers at each farmstead
The abandoned farmsteads can be found south of Cliving, west of the road.\n\nEach farmstead has been occupied by a single White Hand pillager, who has recruited others to help defile the lands.
Defeat the White Hand pillagers at each farmstead ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The abandoned farmsteads can be found south of Cliving, west of the road.\n\nEach farmstead has been occupied by a single White Hand pillager, who has recruited others to help defile the lands.
